patthana21.8:1.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.8:2.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.8:3.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
